title: City & Community - Eyes on the Screen: Digital Interclass Coalitions against Crime in a Gentrifying Rural Town

description: Author Sebastián Villamizar-Santamaría discusses his article, "Eyes on the Screen: Digital Interclass Coalitions against Crime in a Gentrifying Rural Town," published in the March 2022 issue of City & Community.
